name: Windows Gather Directory Permissions Enumeration
author: Kx499
Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>
sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>
description:
This module enumerates directories and lists the permissions set
        on found directories. Please note: if the PATH option isn't specified,
        then the module will start enumerate whatever is in the target machine's
        %PATH% variable.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: FILTER
options.description: Filter to limit results by (Accepted: NA, R, W, RW)

options.name: DEPTH
options.description: Depth to drill down into subdirs, O = no limit
